title: New Mimic View
content:
<!-- HORIZONTAL GAUGE -->
<g transform="translate(120,50)">
  <path d="M1,16 l200,0 l0,24 l-200,0 z" style=" fill:#DDD" />
  <g isis_animation="scaleX" isis_ep="AGA_AM_PRIORITY" isis_domain="117,120" isis_fixed="left">
    <g isis_animation="colour" isis_ep="AGA_AM_PRIORITY" isis_operators="<=$118$#ddb065*>$118$#b8835e">
      <path d="M1,16 l200,0 l0,24 l-200,0 z" style=" fill:#ddb065" />
    </g>
  </g>
  <g isis_animation="translateX" isis_ep="AGA_AM_PRIORITY" isis_domain="117,120" isis_width="200" isis_direction="right">
    <path d="M0,13 l3,0 l0,30 l-3,0 z" style=" fill: #666" />
  </g>
  <text x="0" y="4" fill="#666" style="font-size:10px">117</text>
  <text x="184" y="4" fill="#666" style="font-size:10px">120</text>
  <text x="52" y="4" fill="#666" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px;">AGA_AM_PRIORITY</text>
  <g isis_x="90" isis_y="32" isis_animation="textBox" isis_ep="AGA_AM_PRIORITY" isis_textcolor="0$#FFF">-</g>
</g>


<!-- VERTICAL GAUGE -->
<g transform="translate(40,30)">
  <path d="M26,1 l24,0 l0,200 l-24,0 z" style=" fill:#DDD" />
  <g isis_animation="scaleY" isis_ep="AGA_AM_PRIORITY" isis_domain="117,120" isis_fixed="bottom">
    <g isis_animation="colour" isis_ep="AGA_AM_PRIORITY" isis_operators="<=$118$#96ceaa*>$118$#78a388">
      <path d="M26,1 l24,0 l0,200 l-24,0 z" style=" fill:#96ceaa" />
    </g>
  </g>
  <g isis_animation="translateY" isis_ep="AGA_AM_PRIORITY" isis_domain="117,120" isis_width="200" isis_direction="top">
    <path d="M23,198 l0,3 l30,0 l0,-3 z" style=" fill: #666" />
  </g>
  <text x="0" y="200" fill="#666" style="font-size:10px">117</text>
  <text x="0" y="6" fill="#666" style="font-size:10px">120</text>
  <text x="12" y="150" fill="#666" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px;" transform="rotate(-90, 12, 150)">AGA_AM_PRIORITY</text>
</g>


<!-- HORIZONTAL SLIDER -->
<g transform="translate(220,140)">
  <path d="M10,10 l200,0 l0,6 l-200,0 z" style=" fill: #DDD; stroke: #BBB;" />
  <g isis_animation="translateX" isis_ep="AGA_AM_PRIORITY" isis_domain="117,120" isis_width="200">
    <g isis_animation="colour" isis_ep="AGA_AM_PRIORITY" isis_operators="<=$118$#EEE*>$118$#F70*>$119$#F11">
      <ellipse cx="10" cy="13" rx="8" ry="8" style="fill: #EEE; stroke: #BBB;" />
    </g>
  </g>
  <text x="2" y="34" fill="#666" style="font-size:10px">117</text>
  <text x="192" y="34" fill="#666" style="font-size:10px">120</text>
  <text x="54" y="34" fill="#666" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px;">AGA_AM_PRIORITY</text>
</g>


<!-- VERTICAL SLIDER -->
<g transform="translate(140,120)">
  <path d="M28,10 l6,0 l0,200, l-6,0 z" style=" fill: #DDD; stroke: #BBB;" />
  <g isis_animation="translateY" isis_ep="AGA_AM_PRIORITY" isis_domain="117,120" isis_width="200" isis_direction="top">
    <g isis_animation="colour" isis_ep="AGA_AM_PRIORITY" isis_operators="<=$118$#EEE*>$118$#F70*>$119$#F11">
      <ellipse cx="31" cy="210" rx="8" ry="8" style="fill: #EEE; stroke: #BBB;" />
    </g>
  </g>
  <text x="0" y="212" fill="#666" style="font-size:10px">117</text>
  <text x="0" y="14" fill="#666" style="font-size:10px">120</text>
  <text x="14" y="160" fill="#666" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px;" transform="rotate(-90, 14, 160)">AGA_AM_PRIORITY</text>
</g>


<!-- DIODE -->
<g transform="translate(400,-880)">
  <path style="fill:#000;fill-rule:evenodd;stroke:#000;stroke-width:4;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-opacity:1;stroke-dasharray:none" d="m 0.09962822,952.36218 59.19999778,0" id="path3782" />
  <path id="path3788" d="m 141.10364,952.36218 58.8264,0" style="fill:#000;fill-rule:evenodd;stroke:#000;stroke-width:4;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-opacity:1;stroke-dasharray:none" />
  <path style="fill:#fff;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:3.99281930999999980;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-opacity:1;stroke-dasharray:none" id="path2998" d="M 105.22681,50 63.8067,73.913909 22.386597,97.827818 l 0,-47.827819 0,-47.8278165 41.420106,23.9139095 z"
    transform="matrix(1,0,0,1.0036,38.749817,902.18218)" />
  <rect style="fill:#000;fill-opacity:1;stroke:#000;stroke-width:4;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-opacity:1;stroke-dasharray:none" id="rect3016" width="12.835206" height="96" x="145" y="904.36218" />
</g>

<!-- KNOBE -->
<g transform="translate(220,200)">
  <circle r="80" cx="100" cy="100" stroke="#FDE47F" transform="rotate(126, 100, 100)" stroke-width="10" fill="none" stroke-dasharray="402"></circle>
  <g isis_animation='rotate' isis_ep='AGA_AM_PRIORITY' isis_domain='117,121' isis_angle='292' isis_center='100,100'>
    <path d="M100,30 l6,70 q-6,6 -12,0 z" style="fill: #666" transform="rotate(-146, 100, 100)" />
  </g>
  <text x="50" y="130" fill="#999" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px;">AGA_AM_PRIORITY</text>
  <text x="14" y="170" fill="#999" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px">117</text>
  <text x="92" y="8" fill="#999" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px">119</text>
  <text x="168" y="170" fill="#999" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px">121</text>
</g>

<!-- DIGITAL DISPLAY -->
<g transform="translate(30,320)">
  <g isis_x="0" isis_y="0" isis_animation="textBox" isis_ep="AGA_AM_PRIORITY" isis_textcolor="0$#0C0;119$#E00" isis_font="Digital" isis_size="64px">-</g>
</g>

<!-- TEXT BOX -->
<g transform="translate(30,350">
  <g isis_x="0" isis_y="0" isis_animation="textBox" isis_ep="AGA_AM_PRIOR_MS" isis_size="20">-</g>
</g>
